thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Michael Hoy
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Michael Hoy

author: Michael Hoy
title: Michael Hoy
text: Japan rail pass is definitely a must have, I found it particularly easy especially when travelling with luggage, to be able to walk straight through with no hassels was great. The process to get the rail pass was so simple and arrived in the post two days and provided all necessary information.
